name: 60 Seconds: To your (nice) Demise
description:
"Looks like you're gonna die in 60 seconds, eh? Well, look on the bright side! You're gonna have the nicest death... I think. Just go play some Broken Pong, watch some TV, read books, paint yourself or just enjoy the view while listening to some - in comparison to your current situation - is rather relaxing. Sorry for forgetting to get more air tanks."

Controls:
Moving: WASD or ARROW KEY
Switch TV Shows or Book Pages: A and D or Left- and Right Arrow Keys
Pong: W and S or Up- and Down Arrow Keys
Interact with stuff: E
Exit "Activities"/Minigames: Enter

Quality:
The game generally doesn't have the greatest quality, but for some reason, in the game page itself it's even worse than it actually is - sorry about that! :(
If anyone knows how to fix those issues that I have (I'm using the Godot Engine) please tell me how to fix them, it'd really help a lot! Thanks in advance!

Credits:
Font: Minecraft Schriftart | dafont.com
Art: by HydroDev using Aseprite
Code: by HydroDev using the Godot Engine
Music: by HydroDev using Bosca Ceoil
Sound Effects: randomly generated using ChipTon

Achievements:
Having trouble finding all 8 achievements? Just replay the game and try out the activities again - do something you'd think you should do. Also, each run unlocks more things... well, only the first 3 runs actually.

This game was made for the One Minute Game Jam in February of 2022.
